Title: Preserves the ability to appeal a violation of a defendant's right to make a statement personally in his or her own behalf at sentencing
Summary: Preserves the ability to appeal a violation of a defendant's right to make a statement personally in his or her own behalf at sentencing notwithstanding a defendant signed an otherwise valid waiver of appeal.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to preserving the ability to appeal a violation of a defendant's right to make a statement personally in his or her own behalf at sentencing
